suppressions.justification: Modal backdrop onClick with stopPropagation is a legitimate pattern to prevent accidental closure. Adding keyboard listeners would create UX issues.
role='button' on div elements with onClick handlers is valid ARIA pattern for complex interactive elements that cannot be simple button tags due to styling/layout requirements.
useChat from Vercel AI SDK - external library deprecation not under our control. Migration requires breaking changes across the app.
Vitest mock patterns for fetch API require nested promises. This is standard testing pattern and refactoring would reduce readability.
FastAPI requires async function signature even when using synchronous Firebase SDK. This is standard FastAPI pattern.
Synchronous file I/O for short-lived temp files is acceptable. aiofiles not installed and would add complexity for minimal performance gain.
Email service functions have inherent complexity due to email template construction and error handling. Refactoring would create too many small helper functions.
Type checker limitations with firebase-admin stubs. These attributes exist at runtime but are not in type definitions.
